hero_subtitle: Convert YouTube videos into organized, shareable timestamps.
additional_details_tooltip: Add special instructions for the AI for more accurate timestamps.
additional_details_placeholder: e.g., I want about 10 timestamps, focusing on the main points.
language_select_tooltip: The result language of the timestamp
sticky_timeline_tooltip: Show in Timeline format with time buttons to display the video at that time.
sticky_comment_tooltip: Show in Comment format, ready for editing and use.
timeline_tab_tooltip: Show in Timeline format with time buttons to display the video at that time.
comment_tab_tooltip: Show in Comment format, ready for editing and use.
about_text: Youtamp is an open-source project created to help you quickly and easily create and edit timestamps for YouTube videos.
